data.message: This shit is going to be fucking awsome!! EMINEM IS ON IT!!!!

When does r did it drop???? Eminem I know ur busy, but just have to say you have always been my fav rapper. No matter what kinda mood I'm in I can listen to ur music and (especially when angry) work it out through the lyrics!!! Thanks for coming on the scene and blasting evey obstacle that came ur way and stayed here. You're truly a beloved Artist!!!
